name: SinsFromGod: Aftermath
description:
THIS GAME IS A TEST DEMO! STORYLINE

On a stormy night, you are a man heading home from a long-awaited visit with your parents, when you decided to take a different route home because the main road is blocked off. after finding a new route taking you through the middle of nowhere your car breaks down. Not being able to fix your car you decide to walk up the road to the nearest house. not knowing the sinister past and dark secrets the house holds.

THIS GAME IS INSPIRED BY TRUE EVENTS DISCLAIMER!!!

THIS IS JUST A DEMO TO GET A FEEL OF HOW IT PERFORMS AND SEE HOW YOU GUYS LIKE IT! I AM PLANNING TO RELEASE THE FULL GAME IN EARLY AUGUST. SO IF THERE IS ANYTHING THAT YOU GUYS DO NOT LIKE ABOUT THE GAME IT'S VERY LIKELY THAT IT'S GOING TO BE CHANGED BEFORE THE FULL LAUNCH 

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

1. Download WinRar OR another software that can extract .rar files

2. Download "SinsFromGod: Aftermath" Through the download button below.

3. When Finished Downloading  Extract The .rar file to your desktop 

4. Open "SinsFromGod: Aftermath" File

5. Run SinsFromGod: Aftermath.exe
